mapper.sql: id, slave_addr, slave_port, master_addr, master_port, delay, slave_io_running, slave_sql_running, alarm_level, alarm_time, create_time, update_time, alarm_reason
mapper.select: select count(*) num, alarm_level from gm_mysql_delay group by alarm_level

select
from gm_mysql_delay where alarm_level != 0 order by delay desc limit 0,5
